channel.title: How To Make Command Like This?

item.title: How To Make Command Like This?
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

if (command.startsWith("buystuff1")) { if ((playerHasItemAmount(995, 5000000) == false)) { sendMessage("You need 5000000 Gold Pieces to use this Command!"); } else if ((playerHasItemAmount(995, 5000000) == true)) { addItem(7602, 1); addItem(7605, 1); addItem(7610, 1); addItem(7630, 1); addItem(4151, 1); addItem(7601, 1); sendMessage("You Recieve some items!"); } }

Read full topic
item.source: How To Make Command Like This?
